report.title: Two Weeks
report.author: Global
report.bodytext: Background: I'm 20 years old, in OK physical/mental shape, and I don't use any drug with any sort regular frequency. Rarely do I do any drugs at all at this point in my life. /n /n Normally, I have a hard time getting to sleep. It takes me anywhere from 30 minutes to 2 hours to get so sleep after going to bed, usually. /n /n In short, my 'sleeping schedule' is all fucked up. When I have no commitments and I just go to sleep when I'm tired, I end up staying up for about 20 hours and sleeping for around 10 hours. I also tend to be awake more at night and less during the day. My body seems to be happy with this schedule, but socioty does not. /n /n So, I decided to try some melatonin for a while to see if it will help me. I've been getting to bed around 5:00 AM for the last 3 nights (it was a weekend), and I have work tomorrow at 1:00 PM. /n /n These are my notes on 1-day-short-of two weeks of using 1mg melatonin sublingual tablets as a sleep aid. /n /n May 31 @ 2:50 AM /n 1mg melatonin sublingual /n May 31 @ 3:30 AM /n Another 1mg melatonin sublingual /n Fell asleep: ~4:00 AM /n /n June 1 @ ~3:00 AM /n 2mg melatonin sublingual /n Fell asleep: ~4:00 AM /n /n June 2 @ 2:30 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n I'm finally tired @ 2:51 AM /n Fell asleep: ~3:10 /n I am very tired upon waking. /n /n June 2 @ 2:11 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n Fell asleep: ~2:30 /n I am extremely tired upon waking. /n /n June 4th @ 2:20 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n Fell asleep: ~3:00 AM /n I am very tired upon waking. /n /n June 5th @ around 4: something AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n Fell asleep: around 5:00 - 6:00 AM /n I am very tired upon waking. /n /n June 6th @ 3:30 AM /n 3mg melatonin sublingual /n I am suddenly tired at 3:45 AM, went to bed. /n No notes written down. /n /n June 7th @ 1:00 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n I awoke 6 to 7 hours later not 'groggy' or tired. /n /n June 8th @ 1:50 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n I didn't get to sleep for at least 45 minutes. /n I slept 12 hours. /n I am very tired upon awaking. /n /n June 9th @ 4:09 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n I went to bed at 4:14 AM. /n I have to get up at 8:00 AM. /n I slept 4 hours and got up, a little bit (but not very) tired. /n /n June 10 @ 1:19 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual (after not sleeping all day) /n I have to get up ~7:30 AM. /n I got ~5-6 hours of sleep. /n I was tired most of the day after waking up. /n /n June 11 @ 3:05 AM /n 4mg melatonin sublingual /n June 11 @ 3:20 AM /n 1mg melatonin sublingual /n I become tired @ 3:41 AM and go to bed. /n I obtained sleep @ 4: something AM. /n I got up @ 1:00 PM, but could have sleep for many hours more. /n I am very tired upon awaking. /n /n June 12 @ 5:52 AM /n 2mg melatonin sublingual /n I'm tired anyway, but I'm taking two. /n Thank God I don't have work tomorrow. /n /n Basically, this stuff isn't helping, or I'm becoming too tolerant. It would be OK if I wasn't so tired in the mornings. /n I noticed no diffence in the frequency or vividness of my dreams when I was taking it from when I wasn't. /n /n Once this bottle runs out, I'm not buying another, but I'll use it untill it's all gone.
